headline: Pizza Hut to shut 68 UK restaurants after hiring administrators

headline: Pizza Hut to shut 68 restaurants in UK after company behind venues falls into administration
summary: Pizza Hut is to close 68 restaurants and 11 delivery sites with the loss of more than 1,200 jobs after the company behind its UK venues fell into administration.  DC London Pie, the firm running Pizza Hut's restaurants in the UK, appointed administrators from corporate finance firm FTI on Monday.  It comes less than a year after the business bought the chain's restaurants from insolvency.
